channel.title: Localhost problem with client... NEED HELP
channel.description:
I seriously need help.
Well, I've finnaly found the server I thought I could do something with... But, as I got about half way through of my coding goal, I found out the client doesn't work. The client only works for me, and won't connect for anybody else. I guess its set to localhost and theres some big fix for it. YES I've changed the GUI IP's, I've done everything but still it only connects to localhost.
heres it the original server thread; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397390.msg2950299.html#msg2950299
Rune-warfare
